name: Data Efficient Intelligent Learning Lab
title: Assistant Professor
bio: We are a research group in the Erik Jonsson School of Engineering and Computer Science at The University of Texas at Dallas, and led by Dr. Yunhui Guo.

Our lab develops data-efficient, reliable, and adaptive machine learning systems. We focus on building vision models that can learn continuously, adapt to shifting real-world environments, and generalize to novel scenarios without forgetting prior knowledge. Our work spans theory and large-scale evaluation, driving advances in robust and reliable learning, continual adaptation, and multimodal intelligence. Ultimately, we aim to enable trustworthy AI systems for IoT, mobile computing, robotics, and self-driving cars.
We regularly publish our research findings at top-tier ML/AI/CV conferences like CVPR, ECCV, ICCV, ICLR, NeurIPS, and ICML.
openings: We are looking for self-motivated PhD students and Research Interns. If you have experience in computer vision or machine learning and are interested in solving challenging research problems, send an email to yunhui.guo@utdallas.edu, with your CV, research statements, and transcripts.
